items.content_html: A lightweight authentication system built with React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL. Implements secure user login and signup using JSON Web Tokens (JWT). items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
